thread.title: This Stunning Porsche 911 R Tribute to Steve McQueen Is Now up for Auction
thread.title_full: This Stunning Porsche 911 R Tribute to Steve McQueen Is Now up for Auction

author: Daniel Pearson
title: This Stunning Porsche 911 R Tribute to Steve McQueen Is Now up for Auction
text:
Visit the original post to see all 9 images from this gallery. 
A one-off, custom “Slate Grey” Porsche 911 R, in tribute to Steve McQueen, is set to go up for auction in Paris at RM Sotheby’s this weekend — and yes, it’s as every bit as cool as it sounds.
The car is the only PT 911 R ever delivered to France, and boasts a 500 bhp DOHC six-cylinder engine, a super smooth six-speed manual transmission, and independent front and rear suspension. Inside there’s a murdered-out personalized interior, a Bose sound system, and illuminated door sills lighting up some of the iconic actor’s famous words: “Racing is life. Anything that happens before or after is just waiting.”
If you have the cash, head over to RM Sotheby’s to place a bid. Twenty five percent of the winning bid will be donated to the Gustave Roussy Foundation, the world’s leading cancer research institute.
In other news, Fast and Furious’ s Sung Kang shows off his killer Datsun 240Z .
